CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1962, pg. 22 reads: "Real Reunion - The Junior Mothers' week-end, which drew several out-of-towners, provided a real reunion for former Pittsburghers like this trio. Left to right: Mrs. Jean McCoy Curtis of Philadelphia nad Mr. and Mrs. Ted Coleman of Columbus, Ohio.  Mr. Coleman is also a former Courierite. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Jean McCoy Curtis and Mr. and Mrs. Ted Coleman, seated in Roosevelt Hotel for Junior Mothers party
